text: It's Electronic music, probably synthpop if I had to give it a subgenre. If you like this, seek out Tangerine Dream, Vangelis (especially his Blade Runner soundtrack), Depeche Mode, Yellow Magic Orchestra, Kraftwerk, and if you want some newer stuff, Ulrich Schnauss and Kavinsky.

text: Its a DLC. DLC stands for downloadable content which is what Blood Dragon is. The only thing that's different is that its a stand alone meaning you do not have to have Far Cry 3 to play this. But it uses the same engine and uses everything the same in Far Cry 3 to make a different content than Far Cry 3 but its still a DLC.

text: Personally I prefer the term TotalBiscuit uses; expandalone. It's a game expansion that stands on its own as a completely separate experience from the the original game, but still using many of the games original source materials.

text: Now this is the kind of DLC I like to see,﻿ not just some additional and boring levels because the devs wanted to make some easy money in a lazy way.
